EmailTemplate.name: P1 Letter to Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Customer Complaint Acknowledgment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
We received your customer complaint on {!Case.CreatedDate} through {!Case.Origin}. SunPower is committed in providing you the best customer service possible that will address your needs. We assure you that our team is already engaged to come up with a resolution for your complaint.
Please expect a response from us within five (5) business days. You may call us at 1-800-SUNPOWER (1-800-7867692) for your questions. For your convenience, here is the case number: {!Case.Id}. Thank you.
Sincerely,
{!Case.CreatedBy} SunPower Customer Care
